author: A.F.
title: A.F.
text:
Well, before I bought my items from 21 RUN I was ready for everything, reviews from TRUST PILOT ware not encouraging, but I decide to go and see what would happen, previously I had some bad experience with BIKE 24 and I have manege to sort everything out, so you could say that I am experienced with trouble management from ordering stuff on-line :-)
My experience is super positive.
First positive thing was discount promo that I receive for my first shopping.
Second thing is price fluctuation, at the day when I did my shopping the prices ware lowest to my surprise.
Third thing was fast shipping, 6 days from ordering to my front doors in Croatia.
Forth thing was good packaging, nicely strapped and taped package.
Things that can annoy people are 2 day email replay, my advise is that in your first mail give as much information as possible so that you do not go back and forth with mails, because that could take a long time :-)
Be sure to log in to site, so that price can be corrected for your country.
With my experience, only thing I can do is recommend this shop.
Regards,
Ante
